title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. [Please provide additional steps here]
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node, preventing the item from being selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that I should be able to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. [Please provide additional steps here]
